name: Geoff Duncan
summary: Former Republican Lieutenant Governor of Georgia who refused Trump's pressure to overturn the 2020 election and endorsed Joe Biden, calling Trump 'morally bankrupt.'

keyStatements.quote: I'm committed to beating Donald Trump. And while I'll support policy that I believe in, that doesn't mean I have to support a morally bankrupt human being.
I'm confident that President Biden is the right person for the job at the right time.
Trump lost Georgia. It's not a political statement. It's just a fact.

timeline.event: Refused to attend Senate hearing on election fraud
Faced primary challenges due to Trump opposition

credibility.background: Former Lieutenant Governor of Georgia, former state legislator, businessman

oppositionReasons: Trump pressured officials to overturn legitimate election
Trump is bad for Republican Party
endorsement: Endorsed Joe Biden for President in 2024

sources.title: Georgia's Lt. Gov. Geoff Duncan endorses Biden
List of Republicans who oppose Donald Trump's 2024 presidential campaign
